A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Screenwriters\,Director\, And Disney should be so ashamed of this disgrace to all true fans of a classic story that changed Cinema forever. To see such a cheap\, shallow\, and disrespectful take on characters loved throughout the world is so disappointing but after some thought almost expected at this point. Luke you deserve better\, the true fans of all ages truly apologize for this travesty of a film.
